summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SplitEase app - backend APIs, frontend UI, and integration testing. Fixed critical backend bugs and verified all core functionality works correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: Duplicate field errors in Pydantic model constructors - TripResponse, ExpenseResponse, RefundResponse got multiple values for created_at/date fields
critical_bugs.impact: Blocked trip creation, expense creation, and refund creation with 500 errors

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Google sign-in buttons
Backend API /api/currencies returns list of 13+ currencies
Google OAuth redirect works (redirects to auth.emergentagent.com)
Test user and session creation in MongoDB works
Dashboard page loads with authenticated session
All CRUD operations for trips, expenses, refunds work
